divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching chemtrails being made all around my house in Branford, CT. A lot of chemtrails were being made and I asked my friend what is that. He said a chemtrail and I said look below. I saw a white cigar shaped object, which is odd because I never heard of a white one. It was Southwest and proceeded to go north. I looked at it, ran up the driveway to take a picture. Took one picture that didnt come out good and when I was taking the second picture my hall-full batery camera completly died. I looked up and the object had disappeared into a chemtrail. Then TWO minutes later a grey or white helicoper came out of the tree line and it looked like it was looking for this object. I asked my friend if i should take a picture and he said no. As he said that a flash came from the helicopter. I have no idea what this was; maybe a government aircraft that just disappeared or something from out of this world. I don't know if this has a connection with chemtrails? Also, the object only lasted about 20-30 seconds before vanishing before my eyes.
Summary: White cigar shaped UFO disapears in front of my eyes
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Branford
There were no other sightings in Branford on or around March 10th 2010
